src:
Tuding Iwan Bule Nego Kartel untuk Duduki Ketum PSSI, Vijaya Dipolisikan
02 Nov 2019, 19:29 by Samsudhuha Wildansyah
Jakarta - Salah satu calon Ketua Umum PSSI Vijaya Fitriyasa dilaporkan ke Polda Metro Jaya terkait dugaan ujaran kebencian. Vijaya dilaporkan karena tudingannya terhadap Komjen M Iriawan atau Iwan Bule, yang juga caketum PSSI, disebut bernegosiasi dengan kartel untuk memenangkan dirinya sebagai Ketum PSSI.
Kabid Humas Polda Metro Jaya Kombes Argo Yuwono saat dimintai konfirmasi membenarkan adanya laporan tersebut. Polda Metro Jaya tengah menyelidiki pelaporan tersebut.
"Iya betul, laporannya sudah diterima dan masih diselidiki," kata Kombes Argo Yuwono, Sabtu (2/11/2019).
Pelaporan tersebut tertuang dalam laporan polisi bernomor LP/7043/XI/2019/PMJ/DIT RESKRIMSUS tertanggal 1 November 2019. Pelapor dalam laporan tersebut adalah Samuel Prasian Sinambela.
Dalam laporannya, Samuel mempersoalkan ucapan Vijaya dalam program Mata Najwa. Samuel mempersoalkan tudingan Vijaya terhadap Iwan Bule, yang disebut bernegosiasi dengan kartel untuk merebut posisi Ketum PSSI.
Pernyataan Vijaya itu dinilai telah merugikan pribadi Iwan Bule dan PSSI. Vijaya pun dilaporkan atas dugaan menyebarkan informasi yang menimbulkan rasa kebencian sesuai Pasal 28 ayat (2) juncto Pasal 45A ayat (2) UU RI No 19 Tahun 2016 tentang Perubahan atas UU RI No 11 Tahun 2008 tentang Informasi dan Transaksi Elektronik (ITE).
detikcom telah meminta tanggapan kepada Vijaya terkait laporan tersebut. Namun, hingga berita ini dimuat, pesan yang dikirim detikcom belum dibalas oleh Vijaya.

(mea/mea)
text:
Tuding Iwan Bule Nego Cartel to Occupy the PSSI Chairperson, Vijaya Polished
02 Nov 2019, 19:29 by Samsudhuha Wildansyah
Jakarta - One of the PSSI General Chairperson candidates Vijaya Fitriyasa was reported to the Jakarta Police regarding allegations of hatred. Vijaya was reported because of his allegations against Komjen M Iriawan or Iwan Bule, who was also a PSSI caketum, said to be negotiating with the cartel to win himself as PSSI's Ketum.
Head of Metro Jaya Police Public Relations Commissioner Argo Yuwono when asked for confirmation confirmed the existence of the report. The Jakarta Metropolitan Police is investigating the report.
"Yes, that's right, the report has been received and is still being investigated," said Commissioner Argo Yuwono, Saturday (11/02/2019).
The report is contained in the police report numbered LP / 7043 / XI / 2019 / PMJ / RESKRIMSUS DIT dated November 1, 2019. The reporter in the report is Samuel Prasian Sinambela.
In his report, Samuel questions Vijaya's words in the Mata Najwa program. Samuel questioned Vijaya's accusation against Iwan Bule, who was said to be negotiating with the cartel to seize the position of the Chairman of the PSSI.
Vijaya's statement was judged to have personally harmed Iwan Bule and PSSI. Vijaya was also reported on suspicion of spreading information that caused hatred in accordance with Article 28 paragraph (2) in conjunction with Article 45A paragraph (2) of RI Law No. 19 of 2016 concerning Amendments to RI Law No. 11 of 2008 concerning Information and Electronic Transactions (ITE).
detikcom has requested a response from Vijaya regarding the report. However, until this news was published, the message sent by AFP had not been replied by Vijaya.

(mea / mea)
